name: Rota Craze
description: Easy to learn and family-fun Rota Craze starts out easy enough. But before you know it, it's driving you nuts! As you progress you will need to think outside of the box and find a way to get through each level. Easy to learn, harder to master.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
